item.title: AI
item.description: Reinforcement Learninng # check probability is correct replay reuse, not always interacting, split into stages, or types Computer Vision # build 3d for object classification position for area + class label power up classification for multiple objects in one scene parameter tuning under reinforcement learning: link accuracy as reward, parameter as actions Natural Language Processing # from language to video building voice control to programming voice control to logica, puls add or minus more complicated logic Learning at Udemy S1 - Introduction S2 - Python Text Basics S3 - Natural Language Processing Basics S4 - …
